name: Extus, Oriq Overlord // Awaken the Blood Avatar

card_faces.name: Extus, Oriq Overlord
card_faces.oracle_text:
Double strike
Magecraft—Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, return target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Join me for the dawn of a new age."

card_faces.name: Awaken the Blood Avatar
card_faces.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature sacrificed in this way.
Each opponent sacrifices a creature. Create a 3/6 black and red Avatar creature token with haste and "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 3 damage to each opponent."

name: Igneous Inspiration
oracle_text:
Igneous Inspiration deals 3 damage to any target.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor_text: Prismari fosters a burning need to create.

name: Practical Research
oracle_text: Draw four cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an instant or sorcery card.
flavor_text: The twins each researched spells to defeat Extus in their own way. Will hit the library. Rowan hit everything else.

name: Prismari Campus
oracle_text:
Prismari Campus enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
{4}, {T}: Scry 1.
flavor_text: Mage-students who see spellcraft as the highest form of expression choose Prismari, the college of elemental arts.

name: Prismari Pledgemage
oracle_text:
Defender
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Prismari Pledgemage can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text: Many have the talent to create, but few have the courage to share their creations.

name: Spectacle Mage
oracle_text:
Flying
Instant and sorcery spells you cast with mana value 5 or greater cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: "It would be a crime to withhold my light from the world."

name: Rootha, Mercurial Artist
oracle_text: {2}, Return Rootha, Mercurial Artist to its owner's hand: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor_text: "Art is never finished. Merely abandoned."

name: Magma Opus
oracle_text:
Magma Opus deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Tap two target permanents. Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. Draw two cards.
{U/R}{U/R}, Discard Magma Opus: Create a Treasure token.

name: Magma Opus
oracle_text:
Magma Opus deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Tap two target permanents. Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. Draw two cards.
{U/R}{U/R}, Discard Magma Opus: Create a Treasure token.

name: Grinning Ignus
oracle_text: {R}, Return Grinning Ignus to its owner's hand: Add {C}{C}{R}. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: "Sublime Rehearsal"
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, then put one of them on the bottom of your library, then exile the rest. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way.

name: "Tiger Surfer"
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, until end of turn, target creature you control gains "When this creature leaves the battlefield, exile it instead" and "When this creature is exiled, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token."

name: "Elemental Calling"
oracle_text: Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.

name: Velomachus Lorehold
oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance, haste
Whenever Velomachus Lorehold attacks, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to Velomachus Lorehold's power from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottome of your library in a random order.

name: Thunderous Orator
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Whenever Thunderous Orator attacks, it gains flying until end of turn if you control a creature with flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, indestructible, lifelink, menace, and trample.

name: Thrilling Discovery
oracle_text: You gain 2 life. Then you may discard two cards. If you do, draw three cards.
flavor_text:
"This must be the lost city of Zantafar, where my people lived before becoming nomads. Think of the history we'll learn here."
_Quintorius, Lorehold mage-student

name: Strict Proctor
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a permanent entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability to trigger, counter that ability unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor_text: "You might believe that being dead for centuries has made me more lenient. I think you'll find the opposite is true."

name: Stonebound Mentor
oracle_text: Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, scry 1.

name: Spirit Summoning
oracle_text: Create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
flavor_text:
"Books are fantastic, but if you're really curious about the distant past, why not ask someone who was there?"
—Augusta, Lorehold dean

name: Sparring Regimen
oracle_text:
When Sparring Regimen enters the battlefield, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
Whenever you attack, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature and untap it.

name: Semester's End
oracle_text: Exile any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers you control. At the beginning of the next end step, return each of them to the battlefield under its owner's control. Each of them enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it if it's a creature and an additional loyalty counter on it if it's a planeswalker.

name: Returned Pastcaller
oracle_text:
Flying
When Returned Pastcaller enters the battlefield, return target Spirit, instant, or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Lorehold spirit statues are not forbidden from raising statues of their own.

name: Relic Sloth
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: When it comes to transporting priceless, delicate artifacts, safety is more important than speed.

name: Reduce to Memory
oracle_text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 3/2 red and white spirit creature token.
flavor_text:
"Do not flinch from studying the horrors of the past. History's most important lessons are cloaked in terror and tragedy."
—Augusta, Lorehold dean

name: Reconstruct History
oracle_text:
Return up to one target artifact card, up to one target enchantment card, up to one target instant card, up to one target sorcery card, and up to one target planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.
Exile Reconstruct History.

name: Radiant Scrollwielder
oracle_text:
Instant sorcery spells you control have lifelink.
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile and instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard. You may cast it this turn. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

name: Quintorius, Field Historian
oracle_text:
Spirits you control get +1/+0.
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
flavor_text: "Every life has a story to tell. I won't them be forgotten."

name: "Master of Minecraft"
oracle_text:
Reach
Whenever a creature you control with power equal to its toughness attacks, it gains trample until end of turn.

name: Lorehold Pledgemage
oracle_text:
First strike
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Lorehold Pledgemage gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The weight of history can empower you or it can crush you. It's your choice."

name: Lorehold Excavation
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your end step, mill a card. If a land card was milled this way, you gain 1 life. Otherwise, Lorehold Excavation deals 1 damage to each opponent. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
{5}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a tapped 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.

name: Lorehold Campus
oracle_text:
Lorehold Campus enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
{4}, {T}: Scry 1.
flavor_text: Mage-students obsessed with the secrets of the past choose Lorehold, the college of archaeomancy.

name: Illustrious Historian
oracle_text: {5}, Exile Illustrious Historian from your graveyard: Create a tapped 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
flavor_text: The most distinguished Lorehold professors are eligible to receive extended tenure, even beyond the limits of their own mortality.

name: Illuminate History
oracle_text: Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards. Then if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
flavor_text: "Look at the detail of this stonework! Professor, our assumptions about early Kathorran tool use may not be correct."

name: Hofri Ghostforge
oracle_text:
Spirits you control get +1/+1 and have trample and haste.
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types and it has "When this creature leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to your graveyard."

name: Heated Debate
oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered. (This includes by the ward ability.)
Heated Debate deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: "While you were waisting time with abstract equations, I mastered ancient Oggyar fire magic. Your move."

name: Go Blank
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards. Then exile all cards from that player's graveyard.
flavor_text: The only feeling worse than not knowing the answer is the certainty that you once did.

name: Efreet Flamepainter
oracle_text:
Double strike
Whenever Efreet Flamepainter deals combat damage to a player, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

name: Efreet Flamepainter
oracle_text:
Double strike
Whenever Efreet Flamepainter deals combat damage to a player, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

name: Dueling Coach
oracle_text:
When Dueling Coach enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
{4}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Curate
oracle_text:
Look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "*Kathorran War Chants, Vol. III*? That doesn't even belong in this wing!"

name: Campus Guide
oracle_text: When Campus Guide enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
flavor_text: "There is nowhere in Strixhaven I can't find. Where do you need to go?"

name: Bury in Books
oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets an attacking creature.
Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top.
flavor_text: There are no weapons allowed in the Biblioplex, but a clever mage is never truly defenseless.

name: Blade Historian
oracle_text: Attacking creatures you control have double strike.

name: Blade Historian
oracle_text: Attacking creatures you control have double strike.
flavor_text: "So you see, the reckless battle strategy of the Kathorran orcs was effective, but ultimately proved to be a double-edged sword. As did their double-edged swords.

name: Beaming Defiance
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"I've lived too long in my father's shadower. It's time to find my own light."
—Killian, Silverquill mage-student

name: Ageless Guardian
flavor_text: Ancient ruins dot the world of Arcavios, most older than Strixhaven itself and many still guarded by soldiers from the Blood Age, centuries after their deaths.

name: Academic Probation
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Choose a nonland card name. Opponents can't cast spells with the chosen name until your next turn.
• Choose target nonland permanent. Until your next turn, it can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

card_faces.name: Flamescroll Celebrant
card_faces.oracle_text:
Whenever an opponent activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, Flamescroll Celebrant deals 1 damage to that player.
{1}{R}: Flamescroll Celebrant gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card_faces.name: Revel in Silence
card_faces.oracle_text:
You opponents can't cast spells or activate planeswalkers' loyalty abilities this turn.
Exile Revel in Silence.

name: Codie, Vociferous Codex
oracle_text:
You can't cast permanent spells.
{4}, {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. When you cast your next spell this turn, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile an instant or sorcery card with lesser mana value. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put each other card exiled this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Combat Professor
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Before Yovus was cut down at Pranticle Peak, she performed which maneuverer? Anyone? From the reading?"
